name: This is Us
description: A lot of people love this drama about a family, playing out in two timelines. I watched a few episodes and they were fine but I should maybe give it another chance.

name: Skin
description: Movie about a nazi who tries to quit being a nazi. It has an A24 logo on it so I don´t know what is keeping me.

name: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
description: The hype around this was just so big, and it´s on Amazon but I never get to watch it.

name: Underground Railroad
description: I want to watch this because it is made by Barry Jenkins, who directed the Oscar-Winning Moonlight.

name: Mythic Quest
description: It is a workplace comedy about game developers. And it starrs Danny Pudi, aka Abed from Community.

name: Atlanta
description: I searched for this for a long time, now it is on Disney+. Created by and starring Donald Glover aka Childish Gambino, so this should be interesting.

name: The Flight Attendant
description: In case I need a crime show. It starrs Kaley Cuoco and got pretty good reviews.

name: Minari
description: I still have to watch a lot of Oscar Movies. This starrs one of my favorites, Steven Yeun, so it is on the top of my list.

name: Judas and the Black Messiah
description: Another movie I have high expectations for. With even two favorites, Daniel Kaluuya and LaKeith Stanfield. Daniel won the Oscar for Best Supporting Actor for this.
